title: Common Expression Language (CEL) validations
description:
Security through HTTP headers, including HSTS, HPKP, MIME-Sniffing prevention, Clickjacking protection, and others.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/service-settings/security/

check_expr.title: Check expression
check_expr.description:
The expression that evaluates as a boolean, you can write any conditional. If all stacked conditions are true the request continues, false, it fails to retrieve data from the token, the request, or the response.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/endpoints/common-expression-language-cel/
